content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Use-case: Smelts iron ore into iron plates to support advanced crafting (e.g. Lab production).

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Use-case: Processes copper ore into copper plates for copper cable production and downstream crafting needs.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Argument Validation:
  – When invoking get_entities, confirm the correct signature. Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (such as ‘radius’) and supplying an incorrect count of positional arguments.
  
• Inventory and Placement Checks:
  – Ensure that required items (for example, a Lab) are present in the inventory before attempting to place them on the map.
  
• Null Reference Safeguards:
  – Verify that functions returning entity lists do not yield None. Use an empty list as a fallback when no entities are found before iterating over them.
  
• Crafting Resource Requirements:
  – Confirm that all prerequisites and sub-ingredients (such as iron‐gear‐wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available in sufficient quantities prior to initiating the crafting of advanced items like the Lab.
